name: Doodle Speed Boat Stunt Race - Free Jet Ski Racing Game
name_original: Doodle Speed Boat Stunt Race - Free Jet Ski Racing Game
description:
Hit the waves with some fun doodle arcade action in this speed boat challenge. How long can you last??? Hit ramps for super jumps and dodge other crazy boats on the water! Super easy touch and tilt controls. Fun and challenging, but easy to play for all! See who can top the charts and own the highest score on Game Center!

Download for FREE today!
